ingredients.ingredient: 6 ears corn on the cob, husks and silk removed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Brush corn generously with lime juice mixture before grilling
Grill over medium-high heat, turning frequently for 10-15 minutes until lightly charred
Reapply lime-chili mixture during grilling for concentrated flavor buildup
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do I grill Mexican-style corn with lime and chili for vibrant flavor?
